mapper.update: update attachment set picture_name = #{pictureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_path = #{picturePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_small_path = #{pictureSmallPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_type = #{pictureType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_create_date = #{pictureCreateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_size = #{pictureSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_suffix = #{pictureSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_wh = #{pictureWh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, picture_name, picture_path, picture_small_path, picture_type, picture_create_date, picture_size, picture_suffix, picture_wh from attachment where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, picture_name, picture_path, picture_small_path, picture_type, picture_create_date, picture_size, picture_suffix, picture_wh from attachment
